name: Acolyte
description: Raised in service to a temple, you can draw on the aid of fellow worshipers.

name: Criminal
description: Experienced in illicit dealings, you have a reliable underworld contact.

name: Folk Hero
description: Common folk respect your humble origins and will hide or shelter you.

name: Noble
description: You were born to wealth and wield the manners and influence of the upper class.

name: Sage
description: Years of study grant you knowledge of where to find lore on obscure topics.

name: Soldier
description: You served in a standing army and can leverage your former rank among veterans.
